qas.question: The Buddha Jayanti Park is located in which Indian city?
A notable New Delhi garden is located adjacent to what metro station?
The gardens of New Delhi are particularly stunning in which season?
New Delhi is well known for what type of beautifully landscaped feature?
What is the name of one of the largest gardens in new Delhi?

context: <a0_0>New Delhi<a0_0/> is particularly renowned for its beautifully landscaped <a3_0>gardens<a3_0/> that can look quite stunning in <a2_0>spring<a2_0/>. The largest of these include <a4_0>Buddha Jayanti Park<a4_0/> and the historic Lodi Gardens. In addition, there are the gardens in the Presidential Estate, the gardens along the Rajpath and India Gate, the gardens along Shanti Path, the Rose Garden, Nehru Park and the Railway Garden in Chanakya Puri. Also of note is the garden adjacent to the <a1_0>Jangpura Metro Station<a1_0/> near the Defence Colony Flyover, as are the roundabout and neighbourhood gardens throughout the city.
